title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1214/91 of 7 May 1991 concerning the classification of certain goods in the Combined Nomenclature
header:
9.5.1991 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 116/44
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1214/91
of 7 May 1991
concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The goods described in column 1 of the annexed table are now classified within the combined nomenclature under the appropriate CN codes indicated in column 2 of the said table.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day after its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 May 1991.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1)  OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2)  OJ No L 37, 9. 2. 1991, p. 24.
ANNEX
Description of goods CN code classification Reasons
(1) (2) (3)
1. Box containing 12 rolls of self-adhesive hypoallergenic tape made of a microperforated extruded polyethylene film (dimensions 9,14 m x 2,50 cm) packaged for retail sale for medical uses
2. Saturated polyester in granular form or in aqueous dispersion of a kind used as a sizing agent in the textile industry
3. Agarose
